entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
